title: There is a great barbeque restaurant in Charleston SC called Jim N Nicks. I heard that it may be coming to Wilmington. Is that true?
text: Hello. I'm forwarding your question to a couple of people here who writes stories and/or blogs about local eateries. If they find out anything, it would likely be posted there and they'd notify you. Regards, Vaughn Hagerty MyReporter.com staff
